wikipedia_page.main: John 'Jack' Bowden (17 October 1916 – 22 December 1988) was an Irish cricketer and field hockey player.  He was born and died in County Antrim.

response: *22 December – Jack Bowden, cricketer and hockey player (born 1916).
*17 October – Jack Bowden, cricketer and hockey player (died 1988).

||Bad weather originally delayed the final and when a date was eventually arranged it was again cancelled following the Belfast Blitz. A number of Lisnagarvey players served as A.R.P.s and were unable to travel to the final. The Irish Hockey Union and Limerick PMYA both agreed the trophy should be shared.||Limerick PYMA||Jack Bowden
*22 December - Jack Bowden, cricketer and hockey player (born 1916).
